'''Yasumoto's Last Notes''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Fort Fujitou]], [[Yashiori Island]]. It requires the completion of the {{Quest|Treatment on the Island}} and is time-gated over 4 in real life days (3 server resets).

==Steps==
# Put {{Item|Naku Weed|x=12|25}} in the basket in front of Yasumoto's house once a day for 3 days
#* An [[Exquisite Chest]] will appear the following day the first 2 times this is done
#: <gallery>
Location Naku Weed Basket.png|Basket's Location
Location Naku Weed Basket Context.png|Additional Context
</gallery>
# On the fourth day no chest will appear, and the following notes need to be collected:
## [[Pharmacist's Notebook (I)]]: On top of some crates in the small campsite, to the north-west of the [[Fort Fujitou]] waypoint.
##: <gallery>
Item Location Pharmacist's Notebook 1.png|Location
Item Location Pharmacist's Notebook 1 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
## [[Pharmacist's Notebook (II)]]: On top of a rock, just before the shrine.
##: <gallery>
Item Location Pharmacist's Notebook 2.png|Location
Item Location Pharmacist's Notebook 2 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
## [[Pharmacist's Notebook (III)]]: Directly east of Yasumoto's house and south-east of the Fort Fujitou waypoint.
##: <gallery>
Item Location Pharmacist's Notebook 3.png|Location
Item Location Pharmacist's Notebook 3 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
# ''(Optional)'' Go to the following location to obtain Yasumoto's treasure
#* A [[Luxurious Chest]] will appear near the southernmost Teleport Waypoint on Yashiori Island, next to a bamboo basket with Naku Weed.
#: <gallery>
Pharmacist's Notebook Chest Location.png|Map location
Pharmacist's Notebook Chest Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Gameplay Notes==
* Completing this Hidden Exploration Objective awards the {{Achievement|A Doctor's Odyssey}}.
* The basket next to Yasumoto's treasure will not disappear from its location even after obtaining the treasure.
